name: Ridge
description: An underwater mountain range creates natural barriers and unique marine environments. The underwater location creates unique exploration challenges, while the geological features can contain valuable minerals or create unique ecosystems.
atmosphere: Underwater mountain range creates natural corridors and barriers while currents flow through valleys between peaks. Marine ecosystems thrive in the varied depths as geological features provide shelter and hiding places. Cold water carries mineral scents from exposed rock. Vast underwater landscape of peaks and valleys.
